ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars

Subject: Neo Beast Wars

Quickstrike:



Quickstrike glowered to himself. Tarantsulas was no where to be seen 
where to he looked. He forgot to notice that the night was still in 
effect. He may be away or asleep by now. He paused. Black Arachnia 
may be asleep as well, and him being absent from her side. He 
wouldn't be so skittish if Hell Beast wasn't around. He had a feeling 
he would kill her if he wasn't about to guard her other side. 

He wasn't near tired, but he might as well check. He walked down the 
corridors to Black Arachnia's quarters. He put a multi-fingered 
appendange on the door and called through it, wondering if she was 
there, "Sugar-bot?"
